creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: black damask, bell shaped; 7-1/2" embroidered and appliqued small bell at top with dragons, flowers and phoenix; narrow ribbons outlining top and sides and 5 scalloped appliques across bottom; lined in blue; button loop at top; loops on each side; black, blue, green, pink and purple
title: Under Apron
